title: Elon Musk Tweets (in Jest?) That He Might Quit His Jobs
sub_head: Tesla and SpaceX CEO’s tweet comes days after he said he was ‘aspirationally funny’
body:
Tesla Inc. and SpaceX Chief Executive Elon Musk late Thursday said he might quit his jobs, without providing details about which positions he might relinquish or how serious he was about changing roles.
Mr. Musk on Twitter said “thinking of quitting my jobs & becoming an influencer full-time wdyt,” using an abbreviation for “what do you think?”
